name: florpydorp-ic10-language-support
description: IC10 MIPS-like Language Support for Stationeers - Featuring completions, hover information, signature help, goto definition, diagnostics, and more.

commands.title: IC10: Show Related Instructions
commands.description: Show instructions related to the current instruction

commands.title: IC10: Show Instruction Examples
commands.description: Show examples for the current instruction

commands.title: IC10: Suppress All Register Diagnostics
commands.description: Add @ignore directive for all registers with diagnostics

commands.title: IC10: Toggle Stationeers Theme
commands.description: Switch between Stationeers Dark theme and your previous theme

ic10.diagnostics.enabled.title: Enable Diagnostics
ic10.diagnostics.enabled.description: Show IC10 diagnostics (errors/warnings). Disable to hide red underlines temporarily.

ic10.inlayHints.enabled.title: Show Instruction Signatures Inline
ic10.inlayHints.enabled.description: Show game-style instruction signatures as inlay hints (grey) after the opcode.

ic10.hover.useGameStyle.title: Use In-Game Style Hovers
ic10.hover.useGameStyle.description: Show instruction signatures in the same format as the in-game IC10 editor.

ic10.colors.forceGamePalette.title: Force IC10 In-Game Colors
ic10.colors.forceGamePalette.description: Prompt to switch to the bundled "IC10 In-Game Colors" theme to match the game's colors.

ic10.useRemoteLanguageServer.title: Use Remote Language Server
ic10.useRemoteLanguageServer.description: Whether to connect to a remote language server or run the language server locally

ic10.remoteLanguageServerHost.title: Remote Language Server Host
ic10.remoteLanguageServerHost.description: The host name for the remote language server

ic10.remoteLanguageServerPort.title: Remote Language Server Port
ic10.remoteLanguageServerPort.description: The port number for the remote language server

ic10.lsp.max_lines.title: Maximum Number of Lines
ic10.lsp.max_lines.description: The maximum number of lines permitted by ic10. Errors will be generated for code above this limit.

ic10.lsp.max_columns.title: Maximum Columns per Line
ic10.lsp.max_columns.description: The maximum number of columns permitted by ic10. Errors will be generated for code above this limit.

ic10.lsp.warnings.overline_comment.title: Show Overline Comment Warning
ic10.lsp.warnings.overline_comment.description: Whether to show a warning when a comment is over the line limit (ic10.max_lines)

ic10.lsp.warnings.overcolumn_comment.title: Show Overcolumn Comment Warning
ic10.lsp.warnings.overcolumn_comment.description: Whether to show a warning when a comment is over the column limit (ic10.max_columns)

ic10.lsp.max_bytes.title: Maximum Byte Size
ic10.lsp.max_bytes.description: The maximum byte size of the script. An error will be generated for code above this limit.

ic10.lsp.serverPath.title: Language Server Path (optional)
ic10.lsp.serverPath.description: Absolute path to ic10lsp binary. When set, the extension will run this binary directly (e.g., target\debug\ic10lsp.exe), avoiding copy/lock issues. Leave empty to use the bundled bin/ic10lsp.exe.
